title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 451.9 - Regulations for safety groups
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 451.9 - Regulations for safety groups

State Regulations

The management of the State Insurance Fund is authorized and
directed to formulate such uniform regulations as may be necessary to assure
the establishment and conduct of safety groups pursuant to this Part. Copies of
these regulations shall be filed with the secretary of the board of
commissioners and with the members of the subcommittee of the commissioners on
rating plans, and the regulations shall take effect 15 days after such filing. [See Appendixes D-1 and D-2 of this Title for blank forms of rules and
regulations for safety trade association group and safety trade
group.]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
451.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
